author: @indiatoday
title: PM Narendra Modi to visit Ayodhya, inaugurate railway station and newly-constructed airport - India Today
text: 'Determined to develop city of Lord Shri Ram': PM ahead of Ayodhya visit Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday confirmed his visit to Ayodhya on Saturday, saying, he will inaugurate the newly constructed airport and redeveloped railway station. Listen to Story Ahead of his scheduled visit to Uttar Pradesh's Ayodhya today, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday took to X and confirmed he would be inaugurating the newly constructed airport and redeveloped railway station in the town. "Our government is determined to develop world-class infrastructure, improve connectivity and preserve the rich heritage of Ayodhya, the city of Lord Shri Ram. In this direction, I will inaugurate the newly constructed airport and redeveloped railway station tomorrow," a rough translation from the Prime Minister's post in Hindi suggested. "Along with this, I will also get the privilege of inaugurating and laying the foundation stone of many more development projects, which will make the life of my family members in many areas of the country including Ayodhya and UP easier," he said. According to an official statement, at around 11.15 am, Prime Minister Modi will inaugurate the redeveloped Ayodhya Railway Station and flag off new Amrit Bharat trains and Vande Bharat trains. He will also dedicate several other railway projects to the nation. At around 12.15 pm, the Prime Minister will inaugurate the newly built Ayodhya Airport. Further, at nearly 1 pm, PM Narendra Modi will participate in a public programme where he will inaugurate and delicate to the nation and lay the foundation stone of multiple development projects worth more than Rs 15,700 crore. These include projects worth about Rs 11,100 crore for the development of Ayodhya and its surrounding areas and projects worth about Rs 4600 crore related to other projects across Uttar Pradesh.

author: @cronista
title: LG lanz\u00f3 en Argentina TELEVISORES que lo cambian todo: uno es INAL\u00c1MBRICO y otro PORT\u00c1TIL con pantalla t\u00e1ctil
text: LG Electronics present√≥ en el pa√≠s 4 nuevos televisores de √∫ltima generaci√≥n. Se trata, por un lado, de los modelos OLED C4 y G4 que corresponden a l√≠neas de producto existentes en el pa√≠s y, por el otro, el LG Signature OLED M4 y el StanByME, dos productos nuevos en el mercado local con caracter√≠sticas √∫nicas.LG Signature OLED M4: el primer TV OLED inal√°mbrico del pa√≠sSe trata del primer televisor inal√°mbrico de la compa√±√≠a y el primero en llegar al pa√≠s.El tama√±o de 97 pulgadas se alza como el mayor dentro de los televisores de LG disponibles en el pa√≠s. Este equipo cuenta con Zero Connect Box, la primera soluci√≥n inal√°mbrica del mundo capaz de transmitir video y audio en tiempo real a 4K y 120Hz. El televisor posee un Procesador 11 IA que ajusta la imagen autom√°ticamente mejorando la calidad de visualizaci√≥n seg√∫n el contenido que se est√° viendo y posee un sistema de altavoces de 4.2 canales.La soluci√≥n de transmisi√≥n AV inal√°mbrica de LG fue desarrollada para ayudar a los usuarios que conectan sus televisores a varios dispositivos y perif√©ricos, como consolas de videojuegos y decodificadores, y les presenta una forma nueva y sin complicaciones de administrar cables y dispositivos conectados. Esta admite una amplia gama de opciones de conectividad que incluyen HDMI 2.1, USB, RF, LAN y Bluetooth.El LG Signature OLED M4, gigante y sin cables gracias a una novedosa conectividad inal√°mbrica.LG StandByME: Smart TV port√°til y t√°ctilUn producto √∫nico en el pa√≠s, el LG StanByME es una pantalla port√°til t√°ctil de 27 pulgadas, gracias a la cual es posible realizar un sinf√≠n de actividades.El equipo posee una bater√≠a con hasta 3 horas de autonom√≠a lo que permite disfrutar de horas de juego y entretenimiento en cualquier lugar. Es compatible con ThinQ, Apple Home Kit, Air Play, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, HDMI, USB y NFC. Adem√°s, posee m√∫ltiples opciones de ajuste, que incluyen rotaci√≥n de hasta 180¬∞, giro de 130¬∞, inclinaci√≥n de 50¬∞ y ajustes de altura de 20 cm. La pantalla es t√°ctil por lo que el acceso a las funciones del televisor es muy sencillo y basta con tocar una app para iniciarla adem√°s de poseer un control remoto para manejarlo a distancia. El equipo posee una gran variedad de servicios de streaming OTT integrados con lo que es posible disfrutar de una variedad de contenido sin la necesidad de conectarse a un dispositivo externo. El monitor port√°til de LG, ideal para llevar de un lado a otra de la casa o de un negocio.LG OLED evo C4 y G4: m√°s potencia y m√°s IAEstos dos modelos corresponden a los nuevos modelos de los televisores OLED evos disponibles en el pa√≠s y traen consigo nuevas funciones relacionadas a la IA. Los nuevos modelos tienen en com√∫n la incorporaci√≥n de las √∫ltimas tecnolog√≠as de LG para ofrecer una calidad de imagen a√∫n m√°s realista y detallada. Tienen resoluci√≥n 4K y tasa de refresco de 120 Hz.Tablet Apple lanz√≥ la nueva iPad Mini: trae m√°s potencia y la herramienta que todos esperaban Smartphone Lleg√≥ al pa√≠s un celular que es un tanque: trae una s√∫per c√°mara y se consigue en cuotas Gracias a la funci√≥n de autocalibraci√≥n, los televisores ajustan autom√°ticamente la imagen para ofrecer una mejor calidad. "Aunque ambos televisores son similares en cuanto a sus capacidades, existen algunas diferencias. Una est√° en el procesador, el C4 utiliza un 9 Gen7 mientras que el G4 utiliza un 11, levemente superior, pero ambos con tecnolog√≠a de IA. Por otro lado, el C4 posee un sistema de altavoces de 2.2 canales mientras que el G4 posee uno de 4.2 canales. El C4 estar√° disponible en tama√±o de 83 pulgadas mientras que el G4 estar√° disponible en 65 y 77 pulgadas", detallaron desde LG."Con esta nueva l√≠nea de televisores, LG reafirma su compromiso de ofrecer las mejores experiencias visuales del mercado. La tecnolog√≠a OLED, combinada con la inteligencia artificial y soluciones innovadoras como Zero Connect Box y el StandByME, nos permiten redefinir los l√≠mites del entretenimiento en el hogar y ofrecer formatos innovadores que se ajusten a las necesidades de los consumidores", se√±al√≥ Enrique Laffue, CEO de LG Electronics Argentina.

author: ANI
title: World News | Foreign Experts Hail India's Diplomacy After Qatari Court Commutes Death Sentences of Indian Navy Personnel | LatestLY
text: New Delhi [India], December 28 (ANI): After a Qatar court commuted the death sentence of eight Indian ex-Navy personnel, foreign affairs expert Robinder Sachdev hailed India's diplomacy and said that the new verdict by the Qatari court is a big relief for the arrested personnel and their families. "No doubt, you see diplomacy has also worked. It shows Prime Minister Modi met the mayor of Qatar on the sidelines of the CoP28 which was being held in Dubai recently. So this would have been certainly brought up by the PM with the mayor of Qatar," he said. Also Read | EAM S Jaishankar Says Relationship Between India and Russia Much Deeper (Watch Video). He added, "The judgment by the Qatari court is indeed a huge, huge relief for the families in India. At the same time, there is still some distance ahead because what has happened, is whether the court has commuted or instead of the death sentence has handed some other judgment, which we do at least. As of now, the question will be what is the judgment that the court has now announced?." He said further, "Yes, we understand that the death sentence is no longer in the picture, which is a huge relief. But what else is, because the point is that if the court has kind of judged this as a different category of an episode, then is it a five-year sentence, a ten-year sentence, a 20-year sentence? How long would that sentence be? That is one. But the hope we have is that whatever the sentence in the coming days and months, that sentence could perhaps also be reduced so that we have these sailors back home as soon as possible." Also Read | Israel-Hamas War: IDF Claims Rockets Fired at Southern Israel From Gaza, No Casualties Reported. Additionally, Former diplomat Suresh K Goel also appreciated the Indian government's efforts which resulted in commuting the sentence of Indian naval officers and hoped that if government could ensure their transfer to India in the coming days. He stated, "After the efforts by the govt, their death sentence has been commuted, hope that in the coming days, with more efforts the sentence reduces further or if they can be transferred to India so that they can serve their rest of the sentence here...efforts will continue." Moreover, Former Diplomat, Ashok Sajjanhar said that the commuted sentence is a "welcome development" and added that this is not the end but a need to ensure that all officers would be brought back home safely. He noted, " It is a very welcome development, the whole country was really on an edge...the govt and all those who were involved with it were working very hard to ensure that this sentence is not carried out. This is the first positive development...but of course, this is not the end...we need to ensure that all these officers are brought back home safely with full dignity and all the charges against them are removed." The Qatari Court on Thursday commuted the death penalty sentence of eight ex-Indian naval officers it had arrested last year in the Dahra Global case, the Ministry of External Affairs said in a press statement. The sentence has now been reduced to jail terms. Describing the judgement, the Ministry of External Affairs said, "We have noted the verdict today of the Court of Appeal of Qatar in the Dahra Global case, in which the sentences have been reduced." The MEA also said that the detailed judgement in the case is awaited and are in close touch with the legal team in Qatar. MEA added, "The detailed judgement is awaited. We are in close touch with the legal team as well as the family members to decide on the next steps. Our Ambassador to Qatar and other officials were present in the Court of Appeal today, along with the family members. We have stood by them since the beginning of the matter and we will continue to extend all consular and legal assistance. We will also continue to take up the matter with the Qatari authorities." The eight Indian nationals have been imprisoned in Qatar since October 2022 and were accused of allegedly spying on a submarine programme. The retired naval personnel were sentenced to death by a Qatar court on charges that have not yet been made public officially. Earlier this month, MEA informed that two hearings have taken place in the case. "There have been two hearings. We filed an appeal, with the families, and the detainees had a final appeal. Two hearings have since been held. One was on November 30th and the other was on November 23rd. I think the next hearing is coming up soon," Bagchi said. Moreover, the Court of First Instance of Qatar passed the judgement against them, according to a statement by the Ministry of External Affairs. The MEA spokesperson also highlighted the recent meeting that took place between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the Emir of Qatar, Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad and said that they have had a good conversation on the overall bilateral relationship. Prime Minister Narendra Modi met Qatar's Emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al-Thani on the sidelines of the COP28 summit in Dubai and discussed bilateral partnership and the "well-being of the Indian community" living in Qatar. (ANI) (This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)

author: WZTV
title: chevron-right
text: RUTHERFORD COUNTY, Tenn. (WZTV) ‚Äî The National Weather Service has confirmed a second tornado touched down in Middle Tennessee during the storm outbreak on Wednesday. ALSO READ | [One dead, multiple injured after EF-3 tornado rips through Maury County](https://fox17.com/news/local/radar-confirmed-tornado-hits-maury-county-wednesday-middle-tennessee-columbia-spring-hill-national-weather-service-severe-weather) Preliminary information from NWS reports an EF-1 tornado with 90 mph winds hit Robertson County. The tornado's path, length and width are still being sorted out. Robertson County Emergency Management reports all roads have reopened inside the city limits. However, there are still major flooded areas leading into the city limits in various places. Drivers should use caution and turn around if they see standing water. Officials add all electricity has been restored and traffic signals are working. There were several reported trees down on Wednesday, but at this time, everything has been cleared. author: @shanghaiist
title: Strategies to Achieve Millionaire Status with Solana at $200
text: - Solana (SOL) has experienced a remarkable surge, with its price increasing by nearly 1000% since January 2023, peaking at $123.68 before a recent correction to around $100. Despite a 6.4% correction in the past day, SOL remains one of the top-performing cryptocurrencies, surpassing even Bitcoin‚Äôs 160% rise this year. - To become a millionaire with SOL priced at $200, an investor would need 5000 tokens, which currently cost about $523,000. Solana‚Äôs potential to reach this value is supported by its previous all-time high of $259.96 from November 2021, and analysts predict a bull market in 2024 could push SOL towards or beyond this peak. - Despite the optimistic outlook, predictions from platforms like Changelly suggest that SOL might not hit the $200 mark until at least October 2025, with expectations for the token to remain near $100 for most of 2024. The forecast could change if a bull market emerges next year, but the impact of a spot Bitcoin ETF approval remains uncertain. With its impressive performance in 2023, Solana (SOL) has become a standout cryptocurrency, riding a wave of nearly 1000% growth since January. Despite a recent 6.4% correction and a drop to around $100, SOL‚Äôs performance remains strong, even outpacing Bitcoin‚Äôs 160% rise over the same period. Millionaire Dreams: Investing in Solana for Future Gains To reach a net worth of one million dollars with SOL valued at $200, an investor would need to possess 5,000 tokens. This quantity of SOL currently costs approximately $523,000, assuming recent price levels. Path to $200: Solana‚Äôs Potential Trajectory - Solana‚Äôs all-time high reached $259.96 in November 2021, making the $200 target a plausible future milestone. - Optimism for 2024 is fueled by predictions of a bull market, potential Bitcoin ETF approval, and the Bitcoin halving event in April. However, predictions from platforms like [Changelly](https://changelly.com/blog/solana-price-prediction/) suggest a more conservative timeline, with SOL not expected to hit $200 until at least October 2025. The forecast for 2024 places SOL around the $100 mark but acknowledges that a shift to a bull market could alter these expectations.

author: angel-paez
title: Entre el 29 y 30 de diciembre se prev√©n lluvias m√°s intensas en Ecuador, alerta Inamhi | Ecuador | Noticias | El Universo
text: El Instituto Nacional de Meteorolog√≠a e Hidrolog√≠a (Inamhi) emiti√≥ una alerta meteorol√≥gica de lluvias, tormentas y vientos que afectar√°n varias regiones del pa√≠s. La entidad inform√≥ que esta se encontrar√° vigente desde las 15:00 del viernes 29 de diciembre hasta las 07:00 del 1 de enero. Se esperan que los d√≠as de mayor intensidad de las lluvias se den el 29 y 30 de diciembre especialmente en parte de las provincias de Esmeraldas, Carchi, Imbabura, Pichincha, Santo Domingo, Azuay, El Oro y Loja en este viernes. Publicidad Para el s√°bado las lluvias m√°s fuertes se concentrar√≠an en la provincia de Los R√≠os, Esmeraldas y Loja. La entidad a√±adi√≥ que se puede producir acumulaci√≥n de agua en hogares, negocios y caminos susceptibles as√≠ como presencia de bancos de neblina. ‚Äî INAMHI Ecuador üá™üá® (@inamhi_ec) [#AdvertenciaEc]No. 60 | Se prev√© que contin√∫en las lluvias de variada intensidad acompa√±adas de tormentas el√©ctricas en diferentes provincias del territorio nacional, entre el 29 de diciembre y el 01 de enero de 2024‚õàÔ∏èüåßÔ∏è Mayor detalleüëá [pic.twitter.com/pCF1rLtERw] [December 29, 2023] Las zonas en la regi√≥n Litoral que estar√≠an afectadas son las provincias de Esmeraldas, Santo Domingo, Los R√≠os y norte del Guayas. En la regi√≥n Interandina la mayor intensidad de lluvias se concentrar√≠an en la zona occidental de las provincias de Carchi, Imbabura, Pichincha, Cotopaxi, Bol√≠var y Loja, mientras que en la Amazon√≠a en gran parte de la regi√≥n habr√° lluvias de moderada intensidad. Publicidad El Inamhi gestion√≥ entre el 26 y 28 de diciembre con la NOAA la asignaci√≥n y el uso de un canal mesoescalar de un sat√©lite que sirve para monitorear el comportamiento atmosf√©rico con una resoluci√≥n temporal de un minuto y resoluci√≥n espacial excepcionalmente alta. (I)
